ygData.subject: Re: re: Duster Models
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to complete the Clockwork C quest first (and possibly more then once).  Go to Manik and say I am a new warrior.  He will then give you a shiny card
ygData.messageBody:
You have to complete the Clockwork C quest first (and possibly more then
once). Go to Manik and say "I am a new warrior." He will then give you a
shiny card to give to the clockworks with a C in there name one at a time.
One is located near the throne room, one is on the island in the lake
near the cleric/thieves guild, one is by the tunnel leading into the area
with water wheel and one is by the entrance to the Mines of Malfunction
(this one will alternate with an "A" clockwork). Give all four of the
blackboxes you receive to Manik for faction/minor item. He will then give
you a blackbox that you have to give to Jogl - the gnome by the windmills
with the pet clockwork Charlotte. Jogl will give you one of two "writen
orders" that you give to the merchant in the warrior guild. The merchant
will either give you to Red V quest or the Duster quest. If he gives you
the Duster quest, then the Duster X will spawn by the broken wheelbarrow
near the second tinker merchant in the room with the cleric guild.

QdP

--- Daniel Stock <argovian@...> wrote:
> Now I feel stupid roaming 4 hours waiting for Duster X to spawn. *sighs*
>
> How do I get this Duster Report to make him spawn? I already got Duster
> V.
>
> Thx
>
> Countt
>
>
>
>
> I can confrim this as I completed the duster quest last night and got
> the
> Bootstrutters Pack (Isn't the Gnome who gives you the Jboots quest named
> Bootstrutter? Heh - anyone try giving him his pack back? Just an
> idea).
>
> These junk items that you talk about - I've never seen them before.
> Gnomish Glow Rods? Perhaps these are the rods needed for the thermal
> cloak... I just received a patchwork cloak after completing the Red V
> quest - I'll try to do the Duster and scrap metal quests a few more
> times
> to get these Rods and try a few combinations.
>
> QdP
>
> "Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
>
> > Duster V is still a rare spawn around the enterence.
> > Duster X now only spawns once you turn in the report, he spawns down
> by
> > the
> > tinkering merchant, and doesnt wander anymore, he just stands in
> place.
> > I did this quest once (and am waiting for Duster V to do it again)
> and
> > got the
> > Bootstrutters Pack, 10slot backpack with 10% weight reduction..
> > A lot of the junk that you used to get for this quest (back when
> Dustre
> > X was a
> > wandering rare spawn) can now also be gotten by turning in scrap
> metal
> > from
> > rogues to Sanfryd Feathertop (who used to be called Sanfryd
> > somethingelse).
> > Amongst the normal lanterns/shield junk you can also get gnomish glow
> > rods, and
> > chunks of metal ore that look like balls instead of bricks...
> >
> > Getting the duster report seems to be less common than it used to be
> as
> > well - I
> > get the Red V report a lot more now, previously it was the other way
> > around..
> >
> >
